isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - INSTALL

step1.para: Install the drive gear(s) or pulley on the crankshaft. Tighten the crankshaft nut as specified in the TORQUE CHART.
Replace the discharge and inlet fittings (if applicable) and tighten as specified in the TORQUE CHART.

Install the governor, replace any supporting bracketry and mount the compressor in its operating position. If belt driven, reinstall the belt(s) and adjust to proper tension. Refer to GROUP 12 - ENGINE, Cooling section in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for belt tension.
Connect all air, cooling and lubrication lines. Start engine and inspect for leakage from the air, cooling and/or lubrication lines and connections.
Recharge all the air reservoirs in the system to 100-125 psi.
